name: 3D Tattoo Shop
description:
Tattoo Shop is a 3D game where you can build your own tattoos and deploy on customers for free. Its a casual game for adults since tattoos can be painful.

An ultimate tattoo life where multiple 3D characters are in queue and you need to establish a great reputation in the market.

Features
- Colorful Tattoos
- Multiple 3D characters
- Light Music
- Tattoo Procedures
